General.Name: Kaimei Electronic Corp
General.Description: Kaimei Electronic Corp. manufactures and sells capacitors and motor fans. Its products include conductive polymer aluminum solid, conductive polymer hybrid, and aluminum electrolytic capacitors; and DC fans, DC blowers, AC fans, and accessories. The company also engages in the import and export of electronic products and aluminum electrolytic capacitors; manufacture and sale of resistors, electronic parts and materials, machine equipment, chip resistors, and inductors; and reinvestment, warehousing, and logistics and distribution business. It sells its products in approximately 60 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 81, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22101
